About.Name: James Mwaura
About.AboutText: Hi, Iâ€™m James Mwaura, an electrical engineering student at Seattle Pacific University.I have a strong passion for exploring the principles of electrical systems, circuit design, and emerging technologies in this field. I enjoy working on hands-on engineering projects, collaborating with peers, and applying theoretical knowledge to real-world challenges. I choose electrical enginnering because of my curiosity for problem-solving and innovation, particularly in areas such as power systems, electronics, and signal processing.
